SQL.LOAD: SELECT issue_type_id, code, description, is_system_generated, is_self_cleaning, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by FROM elp_issue_type WHERE issue_type_id = :issue_type_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT issue_type_id, code, description, is_system_generated, is_self_cleaning, elita.getyesno(is_system_generated) is_system_generated_desc, elita.getyesno(is_self_cleaning) is_self_cleaning_desc, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by FROM elp_issue_type --dynamic_where_clause Order by code
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_issue_type SET code = :code, description = :description, is_system_generated = :is_system_generated, is_self_cleaning = :is_self_cleaning, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE issue_type_id = :issue_type_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_issue_type ( issue_type_id, code, description, is_system_generated, is_self_cleaning, created_date, created_by ) VALUES ( :issue_type_id, :code, :description, :is_system_generated, :is_self_cleaning, :created_date, :created_by )
SQL.DROPDOWN_ID: select list_id from elp_list where code = :code
SQL.DROPDOWN_ITEM_ID: select list_item_id from elp_list_item where code =:code and list_id=:list_id
